prompt: Create a vibrant tropical product comparison page with a bright yellow background and green header titled 'Compare Products' in white, plus a back arrow. Display three horizontally scrollable product cards with rounded rectangular images (200px height), bold navy product names, coral prices, red star ratings, and dark green specifications. Each card has an orange 'Add to Cart' button at the bottom, 14px border radius, subtle shadow, Comic Sans MS font, and 18px spacing for a lively colorful design.
